Compatibility

This library has been tested with the following C++ implementations:

Compilers
gcc, clang, msvc, intel
Libraries

libstdc++, libc++, dinkumware

Systems

linux, windows, osx

Platforms

x64, x86, arm

Standards

c++98, c++03, c++11, c++14
